oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Herbert Solomon Garner to W. O. Garner about the depression in Tennessee and WWII starting
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garner, Herbert Solomon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter from Herbert Solomon Garner to W. O. Garner asking how his family is, how the depression is impacting Tennessee, and how with World War II starting up the depression might end.
